page.title: 08OUR HOBBIES
page.content: MY HOBBY IS{CRICKET.}I PLAY IT AFTER SCHOOL WITH SOME CHILDREN DOWN MY ROAD.OUR TEAM IS CALLED THE FLYING EAGLES.WE SOMETIMES PLAY OTHER STREETS AT{CRICKET . MY HOBBY IS{KARATE}.I HAVE BEEN GOING TO{KARATE}FOR ONE YEAR NOW.I AM ON MY 3RD GRADE THAT IS YELLOW BELT.OUR KARATE SUIT IS CALLED A GI.IT IS WHITE WITH TAGS TO TIE UP THE TOP PART OF IT UP.THE BOTTOMS AS WELL.WE WENT IN FOR THE ESSEX SHOTOKAN TROPHY.WE CAME SECOND. ONE OF MY HOBBIES IS GOING TO{BOYS {BRIGADE}.PARTS OF IT ARE GOOD AND PARTS OF IT ARE BAD.THE BAD THING IS MAINLY MARCHING.WE GO TO B.B IN OUR UNIFORMS WHICH INCLUDE A TIE, SHIRT,BLUE TROUSERS,SHOES,BELT,HAVER SACK, AND HAT.WE ALSO TAKE A P.E KIT WITH US BECAUSE WE HAVE INDOOR SPORTS.
